S:log-item.D:comment:
Attached patch increases the maximum possible log file number to 231 -1 and keeps the old limit of 222-1 on soft upgrade. Earlier patch for this problem increased it to 233 -1 , but that fix created upgrade problems because of the additional bits that are used from the file position field, so the limit is being reduced to 231-1.
committed on behalf of: suresh.thalamati@gmail.com
